title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame).
OB: When accessing the Help view, it does not immediately respond to keyboard navigation.
EB: The Help view should be accessible via keyboard navigation without the need to first click on a specific area.
SR:
1. Open the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate the view using only the keyboard inputs.
3. Observe that the view does not respond to keyboard navigation.
4. Click on one of the "live" areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame).
5. Observe that the view now responds to keyboard navigation.
